articles.title: NASA's InSight Mars lander awakens from 'safe mode' after Red Planet dust storm - Space.com
articles.description: The Marsquake-hunting mission will pause science for the time being.
articles.content:
A NASA spacecraft has safely emerged from a precautionary "safe mode" after an intense Martian dust storm.
